body.p: Send a 'POST' request to the method end point with these parameters in a JSON body:

stentry.p: ID of the memory where the search should be performed

strow.stentry: Integer value indicating the maximum number of matches to include
Boolean value indicationg wether the search text should be treated as a regular expression
Boolean value indicating whether the search should be case sensitive or not

body.p: On success, field 'status' is set to 'OK' and field 'process' contains the ID of the background import process that was initiated.
On error, field 'status' is set to 'failed' and field 'reason' contains the error cause.
After starting the import process, monitor its status using the method.
On successful completion, the result will contain an array of <tu> elements that contain the searched text in the data field.
